name: Project SoS
description:
Installation Instructions:

- Download & Unzip

- Launch "ProjectSoS.exe"

Gamepad recommended

Keyboard shortcuts are:

START/Confirm: Enter

Interact: E/RMB

Attack: LMB

Yet another prototype. I haven't come up with music or environmental sounds yet; still thinking about direction I would like to go if I choose to pursue this. 

It's pretty unfinished but any feedback is appreciated.
